net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_setSaveEffect
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Sets a descriptor indicating the result of saving against the Save Damage roll. This is a free-form value determined by the caller. Typical examples are:
"No Effect" "Half Damage" "Damage is unchanged; Other effects are avoided"
Callers must also call setSaveEffectMultiplier and supply the appropriate numerical value.
